TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit BinaryPrimitives extends System.Object
public ref class BinaryPrimitives abstract sealed

summary.span: 将字节读取为具有特定字节序的基元。

span.span: Reads bytes as primitives with specific endianness.

summary.span: 从字节只读范围的开头，将 读取为大字节序。

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte ReverseEndianness (byte value);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8 ReverseEndianness(unsigned int8 value) cil managed
Public Shared Function ReverseEndianness (value As Byte) As Byte
public: static System::Byte ReverseEndianness(System::Byte value);
static member ReverseEndianness : byte -> byte

param.name: value
param.span: 要反转的值。

span.span: The value to reverse.

summary.span: 对指定 值执行字节序交换，以反转基元值，这不会影响 。

span.span: Reverses a primitive value by performing an endianness swap of the specified value, which effectively does nothing for a .

returns.span: 未修改的传入值。

span.span: The passed-in value, unmodified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实际上不会执行任何操作，只是为了保持一致性而添加的。This method effectively does nothing and was added only for consistency.

param.span: 此方法返回时，值作为大字节序从字节只读范围中读取。

span.span: When this method returns, the value read out of the read-only span of bytes, as big endian.

summary.span: 从字节只读范围的开头，将 读取为大字节序。

span.span: if the span is large enough to contain an ; otherwise, .
